name: Social Interaction Trainer
description:
Learn how to conduct yourself in social situations with Social Interaction Trainer, the game that teaches you social interaction.Features
  • Highly accurate simulations of real life social scenarios.
  • Eye physics.
  • Beautifully rendered, high fidelity colors and shadows.
  • Competently effective sound design featuring lush synthetic tones.
  • Regional options to meet the censorship demands of the Web, USA, Australia, Japan and China.
  • Translation of all scenario text to Bogan for Australian localization.
